instance.title: Follow Instagram Home 3
instance.widget_parameters: a:12:{s:12:"widget_title";s:22:"Follow us on instagram";s:5:"cache";s:5:"86400";s:7:"classes";s:0:"";s:8:"clientid";s:0:"";s:11:"accesstoken";s:50:"208906273.467ede5.7a8f5e3849d647448e42761be0769567";s:7:"show_by";s:6:"tagged";s:8:"tag_name";s:7:"fashion";s:6:"sortby";s:10:"most-liked";s:5:"links";s:1:"1";s:5:"limit";s:2:"30";s:10:"resolution";s:14:"low_resolution";s:15:"custom_template";s:116:"";}
instance.xml: <reference name="postscript"><block type="instafeed/widget" name="cc9b1fd5bf591da51c6c1914c99d3b0e" template="icotheme/instafeed/feed.phtml"><action method="setData"><name>widget_title</name><value>Follow us on instagram</value></action><action method="setData"><name>cache</name><value>86400</value></action><action method="setData"><name>accesstoken</name><value>208906273.467ede5.7a8f5e3849d647448e42761be0769567</value></action><action method="setData"><name>show_by</name><value>tagged</value></action><action method="setData"><name>tag_name</name><value>fashion</value></action><action method="setData"><name>sortby</name><value>most-liked</value></action><action method="setData"><name>links</name><value>1</value></action><action method="setData"><name>limit</name><value>30</value></action><action method="setData"><name>resolution</name><value>low_resolution</value></action><action method="setData"><name>custom_template</name><value><a class="fancybox" href="{{link}}" rel="ig" title="{{caption}}"><img class="instagram-image" src="{{image}}" /></a></value></action></block></reference>
